title: Fixing OneSignal issues after an update
body: Some users have reported behavior where Tautulli Remote is stuck trying to register with OneSignal after updating. Please try disabling and re-enabling the OneSignal consent if you are experiencing this issue. Fixes to this issue are being investigated for future updates.

title: Tautulli Remote v3 is released!
body: Tautulli Remote v3 is now fully available on Android and iOS. Tap here to submit any issues or feature requests you might have.

title: Welcome to Tautulli Remote!
body: Important announcements will be shared though this page. Make sure to check the Help & Support section under Settings for links to support methods and device logs.
